CustomField.description: For internal use only. Defines whether or not the record is a draft and allows tracking for editing across multiple clients (incorrect use of this field may result in deletion of a record).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field should remain a 'Read Only' field. Defines whether or not the record is a draft and allows tracking for editing across multiple clients (incorrect use of this field may result in deletion of a record).
CustomField.label: Is Draft
